verses.verse: Elders <S%G4245><s%> Who Are <S%G3588><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> I Exhort <S%G3870><s%> Who Am <S%G3588><s%> A Fellow Elder <S%G4850><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Witness <S%G3144><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Sufferings, <S%G3804><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Also <S%G2532><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> About <S%G3195><s%> To Be Revealed <S%G601><s%> Glory Am <S%G1391><s%> Partaker : <S%G2844><s%>

Shepherd <S%G4165><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Among <S%G1722><s%> You <S%G5213><s%> Flock <S%G4168><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> Exercising Oversight <S%G1983><s%> Not <S%G3361><s%> By Constraint, <S%G317><s%> ' But <S%G235><s%> Willingly; <S%G1596><s%> Not <S%G3366><s%> For Base Gain, <S%G147><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Readily; <S%G4290><s%>

Not <S%G3366><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> Exercising Lordship Over Your <S%G2634><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Possessions, <S%G2819><s%> But <S%G235><s%> Patterns <S%G5179><s%> Being <S%G1096><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Flock. <S%G4168><s%>

And <S%G2532><s%> Having Been Manifested <S%G5319><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Chief Shepherd, <S%G750><s%> Ye Shall Receive <S%G2865><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Unfading <S%G262><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of Glory <S%G1391><s%> Crown. <S%G4735><s%>

Likewise, Ye <S%G3668><s%> Younger Ones, <S%G3501><s%> Be Subject <S%G5293><s%> To The Elder Ones, <S%G4245><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> And <S%G1161><s%> One To Another <S%G240><s%>, Being Subject <S%G5293><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Humility <S%G5012><s%> Bind On; <S%G1463><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> God The <S%G2316><s%> Proud <S%G5244><s%> Sets Himself Against, <S%G498><s%> To The Humble <S%G5011><s%> But <S%G1161><s%> Gives <S%G1325><s%> Grace. <S%G5485><s%>

Be Humbled <S%G5013><s%> Therefore <S%G3767><s%> Under <S%G5259><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Mighty <S%G2900><s%> Hand <S%G5495><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> That <S%G2443><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> He May Exalt <S%G5312><s%> In Due <S%G1722><s%> Time; <S%G2540><s%>

All <S%G3956><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G3308><s%> Your Care <S%G5216><s%> Having Cast <S%G1977><s%> ' Upon <S%G1909><s%> Him, <S%G846><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> With Him <S%G846><s%> There Is Care <S%G3199><s%> About <S%G4012><s%> You. <S%G5216><s%>

Be Sober, <S%G3525><s%> Watch, <S%G1127><s%> Because <S%G3754><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Adversary <S%G476><s%> Your The <S%G5216><s%> Devil, <S%G1228><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> A Lion <S%G3023><s%> Roaring, <S%G5612><s%> Goes About, <S%G4043><s%> Seeking <S%G2212><s%> Whom <S%G5101><s%> He May Swallow Up. <S%G2666><s%>

Whom <S%G3739><s%> Resist, <S%G436><s%> Firm <S%G4731><s%> <S%G3588><s%> In Faith, <S%G4102><s%> Knowing <S%G1492><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Same <S%G846><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Sufferings <S%G3804><s%> Which Is <S%G3588><s%> In The <S%G1722><s%> World <S%G2889><s%> <S%G5216><s%> In Your Brotherhood <S%G81><s%> Are Being Accomplished. <S%G2005><s%>

<S%G3588><s%> But The <S%G1161><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> Of All <S%G3956><s%> Grace, <S%G5485><s%> Who <S%G3588><s%> Called <S%G2564><s%> Us <S%G2248><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Eternal <S%G166><s%> His <S%G846><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus, <S%G2424><s%> A Little While <S%G3641><s%> Ye Having Suffered, <S%G3958><s%> Himself <S%G846><s%> May Perfect <S%G2675><s%> You, <S%G5209><s%> May He Establish, <S%G4741><s%>, May He Strengthen, <S%G4599><s%> May He Found You : <S%G2311><s%>

To Him Be <S%G846><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Glory <S%G1391><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Might, <S%G2904><s%> To <S%G1519><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Ages <S%G165><s%> Of The <S%G3588><s%> Ages. <S%G165><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>

By <S%G1223><s%> Silvanus, <S%G4610><s%> To You <S%G5213><s%> The <S%G3588><s%> Faithful <S%G4103><s%> Brother, <S%G80><s%> As <S%G5613><s%> I Reckon, <S%G3049><s%> ' <S%G1223><s%> Briefly <S%G3641><s%> I Wrote, <S%G1125><s%> Exhorting <S%G3870><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Testifying <S%G1957><s%> This <S%G3778><s%> To Be The <S%G1511><s%> True <S%G227><s%> Grace <S%G5485><s%> <S%G3588><s%> Of God, <S%G2316><s%> In <S%G1519><s%> Which <S%G3739><s%> Ye Stand. <S%G2476><s%>

Salutes <S%G782><s%> You <S%G5209><s%> She <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Babylon <S%G897><s%> Elected With You, <S%G4899><s%> And <S%G2532><s%> Mark <S%G3138><s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G5207><s%> My Son. <S%G3450><s%>

Salute <S%G782><s%> One Another <S%G240><s%> With <S%G1722><s%> A Kiss <S%G5370><s%> Of Love. <S%G26><s%> Peace <S%G1515><s%> Be With You <S%G5213><s%> All <S%G3956><s%> Who Are <S%G3588><s%> In <S%G1722><s%> Christ <S%G5547><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Amen. <S%G281><s%>
